links.description: An interesting, long video about bullying in Australia.
Some facts and tips about bulling.

questions.question: What is this chapter mainly about?
answers: Harry talks to Dumbledore and Snape. While talking, a few visitors arrive.  Harry and Ron each win Gryffindor 200 points, so Gryffindor wins the House Cup again. The school year comes to a close.
Harry talks to Dumbledore. While talking, a few visitors arrive.  Harry and Ron each win Gryffindor 200 points, so Gryffindor wins the House Cup again. The school year comes to a close.
Harry talks to Dumbledore. While talking, a few visitors arrive.  Harry wins Gryffindor 200 points, so Gryffindor wins the House Cup again. The school year comes to a close.
Harry talks to Dumbledore and Professor McGonagall. Harry and Ron each win Gryffindor 200 points, so Gryffindor wins the House Cup again. The school year comes to a close.

questions.question: What does Dumbledore tell Harry about how Tom and Harry different?
answers: Tom and Harry make vastly different choices despite having similar abilities.
Tom despises Muggles while Harry likes them.
Tom is a Slytherin, and Harry is a Gryffindor.

questions.question: Who secretly planted the diary in Ginny's Transformation textbook?
What happens when Lucius Malfoy throws the sock at Dobby?
